meanings.definition: A three-dimensional geometric shape resembling a flattened sphere.
meanings.sent1: The artist sculpted a small ellipsoid out of clay.
meanings.sent2: The children played with a bouncy ellipsoid ball in the park.
meanings.sent3: The ellipsoid-shaped cake was a hit at the birthday party.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room, filling it like an ellipsoid.
meanings.sent5: The ellipsoid rock formation stood out against the flat landscape.

meanings.definition: A surface that is the locus of points at a constant distance from a fixed point.
meanings.sent1: The satellite orbits the Earth in an ellipsoid path.
meanings.sent2: The mirror reflected her image in a distorted ellipsoid shape.
meanings.sent3: The detective followed the ellipsoid footprints in the snow.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts moved in an ellipsoid trajectory, circling back to the same point.
meanings.sent5: The ellipsoid shadow cast by the streetlight stretched across the pavement.
